name: Bacon-Wrapped Hot Dogs

instructions.en: Split hot dogs lengthwise but not all the way through. Open up flat.
instructions.sk: Rozrežte párky pozdĺžne, ale nie úplne. Rozložte naplocho.
instructions.ja: ホットドッグを縦に切り込みを入れますが、完全には切り離さないでください。平らに開きます。

instructions.en: Cut cheese into 2 or 3 little sticks and insert into the hot dog slits.
instructions.sk: Nakrájajte syr na 2 alebo 3 malé tyčinky a vložte ich do zárezov v párkoch.
instructions.ja: チーズを2〜3本の小さな棒状に切り、ホットドッグの切り込みに挿入します。

instructions.en: Wrap a strip of bacon around the hot dog from end to end, distributing evenly.
instructions.sk: Obaľte pásik slaniny okolo párku od jedného konca k druhému, rovnomerne ho rozložte.
instructions.ja: ベーコンの細切りをホットドッグの端から端まで均等に巻きつけます。

instructions.en: Place on foil-lined baking sheet and broil until bacon is crisp, watching closely to prevent burning.
instructions.sk: Položte na plech vyložený alobalom a grilujte, kým slanina nie je chrumkavá. Pozorne sledujte, aby sa nepripálili.
instructions.ja: アルミホイルを敷いたベーキングシートに置き、ベーコンがカリカリになるまでブロイルします。焦げないように注意深く見守ってください。

notes: The carb count will vary depending on the brand of hot dogs. Oscar Mayer bun-length hot dogs have about 1 carb each. Hebrew National, Nathan's, Boar's Head and Oscar Mayer all make hot dogs that have about 2 carbs or less each. It took about 2 ounces of cheese for three hot dogs.
